column4: When I installed, I set aside a few partitions for music, photos, and backup storage space.  Each partition is mounted /music ,/photos , /backup etc and belongs to root.  How can I adjust those permissions? :(
Bah.. I misread your question.. sorry.  No, you don't need to add the groups part if it's not needed.  Wuld be simply "chown username /music"
